artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Iseya Kanekichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: {Au koto no / Taete shi naku wa / Nakanaka ni / Hito wo mo mi wo mo / Urami zara ma shi} (If I know / I could never see you again / It would be even better / Beacuse I no longer wait for the next meeting / I don't have to suffer from the frustration.)
markings: censor seals: {Hama} | {Magome} | (Rat 9) | publisher's seal: {Isekane} | carver's seal: 彫竹 {hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Visual Parody of the Thirty-Six Selected Poets (Mitate sanjūrokkasen no uchi 見立三十六歌撰之内)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Poem by Chūnagon Asatada: (Actor Bandō Shūka I as) Urazato
